title: Projects
text:
Stock Analytics Website
A web-based stock analysis platform for data-driven investing.



It includes: - Real-time stock prices
- RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands
- Portfolio risk & returns
- AI-generated summaries
ðŸ”— Live Website


Preschool Educational Game
An interactive educational game designed for preschool children.



Features: - Pattern recognition
- Memory
- Problem solving
- Engaging UI & sound


Facial Recognition (OpenCV & ML)
A real-time facial recognition system using Python and OpenCV.



Features: - Face detection
- Feature extraction
- ML identity recognition
- Live webcam prediction

title: About

title: Home
text:
I am a FinTech and Applied Computing student at Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT) with a strong interest in AI, finance, and software engineering.
I enjoy building:

Trading algorithms

Data dashboards

AI-powered tools

This website showcases my experience, projects, and reflections.

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI
text: I used ChatGPT to help me: - Structure my Quarto website - Write clean Markdown - Organize my portfolio pages

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI
text: I used ChatGPT to help me: - Structure my Quarto website - Write clean Markdown - Organize my portfolio pages

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI
text:
Benefits
GenAI helped me quickly: - Convert ideas into formatted web pages - Debug Quarto and GitHub issues - Improve clarity of writing

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI
text:
Challenges
Sometimes the output needed: - Verification - Adjustments for technical accuracy

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI
text:
Future use
I will continue using GenAI for: - Coding - Data analysis - Technical writing - System design
